author: Xerbutri
description: Viaduc d"Audin-le-Tiche, bridge crossing the vally of the village Audin-le-Tiche
realname: Viaduc d"Audin-le-Tiche, bridge crossing the vally of the village Audin-le-Tiche
title: Viaduc d'Audin
intro: We visited this abanoned bridge in 2009. Ten years after the railway was closed. It was cold that morning, but the bridge is nice!
history: The bridge was built in 1904. It served mainly military strategic purposes, it offered Germany a new route into France. In 1940 the bridge was demolished by the French troops. The railway line was closed in 1999, ending all traffic over the bridge.
